gulpfile.js
¶ 
1  var gulp = require('gulp');
2  
3  var paths = {
4    readme: 'README.md',
5    markup: 'src/**/*.html',
6    scriptsRoot: 'src/js/',
7    scripts: 'src/js/**/*.js',
8    assets: ['src/assets/*.png', 'src/assets/*.jpg'],
9    css: 'src/css/*.css',
10    dist: 'dist',
11    docsOutput: 'dist/docs',
12    mainjs: './src/js/main.js',
13    bundlejs: 'bundle.js'
14  };
15  
16  gulp.task('build', ['lint-js', 'build-js', 'build-markup', 'build-assets', 'build-css', 'build-docs']);
17  
18  gulp.task('lint-js', function () {
19    var jshint = require('gulp-jshint');
20    var stylish = require('jshint-stylish');
21  
22    gulp.src(paths.scripts)
23      .pipe(jshint())
24      .pipe(jshint.reporter(stylish));
25  });
26  
27  gulp.task('beautify', function () {
28    var beautify = require('gulp-beautify');
29  
30    gulp.src(paths.scripts)
31      .pipe(beautify())
32      .pipe(gulp.dest(paths.scriptsRoot));
33  });
34  
35  gulp.task('build-js', function () {
36    var browserify = require('browserify');
37    var source = require('vinyl-source-stream');
38  
39
¶

var streamify = require('gulp-streamify'); var uglify = require('gulp-uglify');

 
40  
41  
42    var bundleStream = browserify(paths.mainjs).bundle();
43  
44    bundleStream
45      .pipe(source(paths.bundlejs))
46  
47
¶

.pipe(streamify(uglify()))

 
46  
47    .pipe(gulp.dest(paths.dist + '/js'));
48  });
49  
50  gulp.task('build-markup', function () {
51    return gulp.src(paths.markup)
52      .pipe(gulp.dest(paths.dist));
53  });
54  
55  gulp.task('build-assets', function () {
56    var imagemin = require('gulp-imagemin');
57    return gulp.src(paths.assets)
58      .pipe(imagemin())
59      .pipe(gulp.dest(paths.dist + '/assets'));
60  });
61  
62  gulp.task('build-css', function () {
63    return gulp.src(paths.css)
64      .pipe(gulp.dest(paths.dist + '/css'));
65  });
66  
67  
68  
69  gulp.task('static-server', function (next) {
70    var connect = require('connect');
71    var server = connect();
72    server.use(connect.static(paths.dist)).listen(process.env.PORT || 3002, next);
73  });
74  
75  gulp.task('watch', ['build', 'trigger-reload', 'build-markup-with-livereload', 'static-server'], function () {
76  
77    gulp.watch(paths.scripts, ['lint-js', 'build-js']);
78    gulp.watch(paths.markup, ['build-markup-with-livereload']);
79    gulp.watch(paths.assets, ['build-assets']);
80    gulp.watch(paths.css, ['build-css']);
81  
82  
83
¶

Watch everything except dist and node_modules for documentation updates.

 
82  
83    gulp.watch([paths.markup, paths.scripts, paths.readme], ['build-docs']);
84  });
85  
86  gulp.task('trigger-reload', function () {
87    var livereload = require('gulp-livereload');
88    var server = livereload();
89    gulp.watch(paths.dist + '/**').on('change', function (file) {
90      server.changed(file.path);
91    });
92  });
93  
94  gulp.task('build-markup-with-livereload', function () {
95    var embedlr = require("gulp-embedlr");
96    gulp.src(paths.markup)
97      .pipe(embedlr())
98      .pipe(gulp.dest(paths.dist));
99  });

106  gulp.task('build-docs', function () {
107

var docco = require('gulp-docco');

 
107  
108    var Docker = require('docker');
109  
110    var d = new Docker({
111      inDir: '.',
112      outDir: 'dist/docs',
113      colourScheme: 'monokai',
114      ignoreHidden: 'true',
115      exclude: 'node_modules*,dist*',
116      lineNums: true,
117      extras: ['fileSearch', 'goToLine'],
118      onlyUpdated: true
119    });
120  
121    return d.doc(['./']);
122

¶ clean

Remove all filses in the dist folder.

 
129  
130  gulp.task('clean', function (cb) {
131    var rimraf = require('rimraf');
132    return rimraf('./dist', cb);
133  });
134  
135

default task

 
136  
137  gulp.task('default', ['watch']);
